body: I am from the Overcast Network, I decided to give Avicus a shot. Don't know what else to say... AMA i guess.
body_tagged: I am from the Overcast Network, I decided to give Avicus a shot. Don't know what else to say... AMA i guess.
title: Hi! I'm CubesAndDominoes

replies.body:
Welcome to Avicus!
How did you come up with your name?
Is OCN fun? :3
Is Avicus fun? :3
replies.body_tagged:
Welcome to Avicus!
How did you come up with your name?
Is OCN fun? :3
Is Avicus fun? :3

replies.body:
How did you come up with your name? I can solve a Rubik's Cube and I played with dominoes when I was younger.
Is OCN fun? :3 Yep, I've played for over a year though so I'm biased :P
Is Avicus fun? :3 It's much better than I expected it to be. It's almost as fun as OCN.

EDIT: why aren't the links working? ;-;

Which do you prefer: Pen or pencil

replies.body: Pencil because I can erase. I ALWAYS screw up when I use a pen xD
